channel.title: Geek Riot w/ iJustine and Shawn
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.description: Join hosts Shawn and Justine to talk about technology, tv, web, music, comics, and everything in between. We will discuss everything geek. Live every Sunday @ 10:00pm Eastern. Visit www.geekriot.tv for more info. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com

item.description: Justin from Justin.tv joins us for some talk about webcams on your head 24/7. Also we have the Tech Evangelist for a spirited discussion or two. This is a long show but worth the price of admission.

item.title: EPISODE7 - Geek Riot - Guests: VideoGrunt.com and HowtoGirl.com
item.author: sjsonline@gmail.com
item.description:
This show is a must listen for anyone interested in podcasting.
We had Madeline Merced and Eric Wyeth from HowtoGirl.com and Craig Syverson from VideoGrunt.com/PodGrunt.com. The guests first explained the premise of their video podcasts. Justin Kownacki from STBD.tv also called in to talk about PodcampPittsburgh.com Then we had some very interesting discussions about the future of and status of the industry. We were very lucky to have some very knoweledgable and succesful podcasters join the show.
item.itunes:author: ShawnSmith
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE7 - Geek Riot - Guests: VideoGrunt.com and HowtoGirl.com
